categories.name: IoT Devices & Telemetry
categories.description: UI kits and dashboards for connected devices, gateways, and sensor fleets.

categories.name: Smart Controllers
categories.description: Interfaces for control boards, embedded controllers and on-device configuration.

categories.name: Developer Boards
categories.description: Layouts for lab setups, evaluation kits and hardware bring-up flows.

categories.name: Sensor & Connectivity Kits
categories.description: UI kits for RF, BLE, WiFi, Zigbee and mixed sensor/connector modules.

categories.name: Edge Computing
categories.description: Dashboards for edge nodes, gateways, racks and on-prem compute clusters.

categories.name: AI Accelerators
categories.description: Interfaces for embedded AI, on-device inference and accelerator health.

products.name: IoT Fleet Control Dashboard
products.summary: Multi-device control surface for sensors, gateways and edge nodes with alert lanes and health timelines.

products.name: Field Technician Tablet UI
products.summary: Tablet-first layouts for technicians: work orders, device health, offline-first workflows.

products.name: Embedded Device Setup Flows
products.summary: Step-by-step setup flows for hubs, routers and smart controllers including pairing and firmware updates.

products.name: Controller Maintenance Console
products.summary: Maintenance views for firmware, configuration snapshots and rollback operations across controllers.

products.name: Lab Developer Board Dashboard
products.summary: Bring-up console for dev boards: serial logs, voltage rails, GPIO states and quick flash tools.

products.name: Hardware Partner Landing System
products.summary: Landing page system for partner programs, certified hardware and co-marketing launches.

products.name: Sensor & Connectivity Kits UI
products.summary: Boards and module cards for BLE, WiFi, RF and Zigbee stacks with status and pairing states.

products.name: Sensor Fleet Monitor
products.summary: Compact dashboards for sensor fleets: signal quality, battery, connectivity and calibration.

products.name: Edge Control Room Wall UI
products.summary: Large-screen layouts for NOC/SOC style views across edge nodes, clusters and incidents.

products.name: Edge Node Ops Console
products.summary: Ops-first layouts for managing edge nodes, deployments, rollbacks and health checks.

products.name: AI Accelerator Inference Dashboard
products.summary: Inference-centric dashboards for latency, throughput, errors and model variants.

products.name: AI Accelerator Health Console
products.summary: Thermals, memory, power and utilization views for accelerator devices and racks.
